input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product features and product title information.


Product title:
New Vibe Silver Flip Top Lighter - DJ Turntable Record

Product features:
Space Case by New Vibe decorative silver flip top lighter
Image appears on both sides
Ships in a tin box making it a perfect gift idea
Bundled with a Space Case by New Vibe dog tag necklace
Windproof design; removable flint; lighter fluid not included
Space Case by New Vibe lighters designed & printed axclusively in the USA

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Space Case by New Vibe lighters designed & printed exclusively in the USA. These decorative silver flip top lighters are windproof and include a removable flint and are shipped in a tin box, making them perfect gift ideas. The image appears on both sides. Lighter fluid is not included. bundled with a Space Case by New Vibe dog tag necklace.
input_text.Response B: The Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral) is a stylish and comfortable helmet that offers great protection for your head. The In-Mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner provides impact resistance, while the Acu Dial fit system ensures a perfect fit. The 20 vents keep your head cool and the snap-fit visor provides extra protection from the sun. This helmet is perfect for anyone who wants to stay safe and look good while cycling.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: Response B wasn't even talking about the same item
